General.Name: Iervolino & Lady Bacardi Entertainment S.p.A.
General.Description: Iervolino & Lady Bacardi Entertainment S.p.A., a production company, produces and distributes films worldwide. It specializes in the production of film and television content, including web series, movies, TV shows, short TV shows, and others, as well as animation works. The company also engages in licensing of characters and pipelines; post-production activities; and celebrity management, casting, and production of digital ADV content business. The company was formerly known as Iervolino Entertainment S.p.A. and changed its name to Iervolino & Lady Bacardi Entertainment S.p.A. in June 2021. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy.

4.Name: Ms. Monika  Bacardi
4.Title: Exec. Director of Institutional Relations & Individual Investor
